mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ACCESSID`, t1.`ACCESSNAME`, t1.`ACCESS_KEY`, t1.`ACCESS_TOKEN`, t1.`AGENT_ID`, t1.`DISABLED`, t1.`EXPIRES_TIME`, t1.`NOTIFY_URL`, t1.`OPEN_TYPE`, t1.`REDIRECT_URI`, t1.`REGION_ID`, t1.`SECRET_KEY` FROM `IBZOPENACCESS` t1 ) t1 where accessid=#{id}

select t1.* from (SELECT t1.ACCESSID, t1.ACCESSNAME, t1.ACCESS_KEY, t1.ACCESS_TOKEN, t1.AGENT_ID, t1.DISABLED, t1.EXPIRES_TIME, t1.NOTIFY_URL, t1.OPEN_TYPE, t1.REDIRECT_URI, t1.REGION_ID, t1.SECRET_KEY FROM IBZOPENACCESS t1 ) t1 where accessid=#{id}
